Interface ec.ifc.app.WindowController 
All Packages  Class Hierarchy  This Package  Previous  Next  Index

Interface ec.ifc.app.WindowController

public interface WindowController
extends Object
extends Target
Interface for an object that controls a window's position and visibility.

PRESENT_COMMAND
command to show the controlled window if necessary and bring it to the front

getWindow()
Returns the controlled window
hide()
Hides the controlled window
present()
shows the controlled window if necessary and brings it to the front
reposition()
Repositions the controlled window based on relevant aspects of current context such as screen size, other window locations, etc.
setWindow(Window)
Sets which window is controlled.
shouldRepositionBeforePresenting()
Returns whether the controlled window's position should be adjusted before it is displayed.

PRESENT_COMMAND 
  public final static String PRESENT_COMMAND
command to show the controlled window if necessary and bring it to the front

getWindow 
  public abstract Window getWindow()
Returns the controlled window
hide 
  public abstract void hide()
Hides the controlled window
present 
  public abstract void present()
shows the controlled window if necessary and brings it to the front
reposition 
  public abstract void reposition()
Repositions the controlled window based on relevant aspects of current context such as screen size, other window locations, etc.
setWindow 
  public abstract void setWindow(Window newWindow)
Sets which window is controlled.
shouldRepositionBeforePresenting 
  public abstract boolean shouldRepositionBeforePresenting()
Returns whether the controlled window's position should be adjusted before it is displayed.
